# c-option

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description            | Type               | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------- | ------------------ | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Set option as disabled | `boolean`          | `false`     |
| `name`     | `name`     | Option name            | `string`           | `undefined` |
| `selected` | `selected` | Set option as selected | `boolean`          | `false`     |
| `value`    | `value`    | Option value           | `number \| string` | `undefined` |
